message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob.  I get $650,000 and you get $350,000.  This gives us both a good chunk of the money.  Remember, inflation hurts us both as time goes on.
I think it's fairer to split the money closer to 60/40.  Let's get this done before inflation eats away at our gains.

Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but your previous offer wasn't fair considering the inflation. This offer gets us closer to a 50/50 split while still acknowledging the shrinking pot. Let's close this out.
